name: BASTON (Txori)
description:
Create your own Fighters and Backgrounds, share your collection with your friends and prepare for the ultimate battle: the BASTON.

I started to develop this game back in 2016, as a spiritual successor of Dragon Ball Devolution. Then I added the Editors to it, which opened new perspectives and permitted a lot of players to start drawing sprites. Some even became really good at it. I'm planning to resurrect this project during the summer.

You'll need to download Fighter and Background packs to populate your collection. Just unzip them in your BASTON/collection folder before launching the game.
